department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: To establish supply arrangements for Z services.
description: To establish supply arrangements for Z services.
full_summary:
**RFSA (Request for Supply Arrangement)**

### English Specifics

* **Title:** DAMA (October 24)
* **Reference Number:** WS3721557400-Doc3721557451
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3721557400
* **Publication Date:** October 24, 2022
* **Closing Date:** October 24, 2022 14:00:00
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (RFS Const)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements:** CFTA, Canada-UK TCA, CPFTA, CKFTA, CHFTA, CPTPP, CETA, CUFTA, AECG
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Country-Wide, encompassing the entire nation of Canada.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Country-Wide, encompassing the entire nation of Canada.
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Points of Contact:** April Charron, Director of the Procurement Branch, (April.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 
### French Specifics

* **Title:** Demande d’Arrangement d’Approvisionnement (DAMA) du 24 octobre
* **Référence:** WS3721557400-Doc3721557451
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3721557400
* **Date de Publication:** 24 octobre 2022
* **Date de Cloture de l’Appel d’Offres:** 24 octobre 2022 14h00
* **Méthode d’approvisionnement:** Concurrentielle – Appel d’offres sélectif
* **Type d’avis:** Demande d’arrangement d’approvisionnement (DRA Const)
* **Criteres de sélection:** Coût par point le plus bas
* **Accords commerciaux commerciaux:** ALEC, ACCRU, ALECP, ACCFC, ACCH, AC-P, ACCU, AECG
* **Régions d’opportunité:** Tout le territoire canadien.
* **Régions de livraison:** Tout le territoire
